meanings: (장애물·구멍 등에) catch, be caught, be[get] stuck (in), (기계 등에 끼이다) be[get] jammed, (발이) trip, stumble
(그물·덫 등에) (그물 등에) be[get] caught[entangled], (덫에) be trapped[entrapped]

vlive.korean: 근데 걸리긴 해. But he is in the frame. 듣기 View video 슈주 리턴즈 : [슈퍼TV 속 TV]_예성TV1
vlive.english: But he is in the frame.

vlive.korean: 적어도 뭐 한번 걸리긴 하겠네. You will get caught at least once. 듣기 View video DAY6 : DAY6는 뒷풀이 라이브 중 (Feat. Adieu Every DAY6!)
vlive.english: You will get caught at least once.

vlive.korean: 안 걸리긴 했는데 왜 멈췄어? You didn't get caught. Why did you stop? 듣기 View video iKON : [KONIC TV] 코니들의 신나는 여름밤
vlive.english: You didn't get caught. Why did you stop?

vlive.korean: 원래 오래 걸리긴 하는데 피자는 금방 먹더라고요. Yeah, I do but not for pizza. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : MONSTA X KIHYUN, HYUNGWON, JOOHEON’s 몬스타엑스 기현,형원,주헌 X 같이먹어요
vlive.english: Yeah, I do but not for pizza.

vlive.korean: [불안 불안] 사실 나도 그 부분이 걸리긴 했어. [Worried] That's what I was worried about. 듣기 View video 포토피플(PHOTO PEOPLE) : 포토피플 시즌5_ ep3 이제부터 당신도 사진에 중독됩니다
vlive.english: [Worried] That's what I was worried about.
